content.prompt: In the final paragraph, the author mentions paying off her mother’s mortgage primarily to

choices.label: emphasize how little her mother’s life has changed since she paid the fee described in the first paragraph
show that her mother was justified in paying the fee described in the first paragraph
illustrate the dramatic change in the author’s circumstances since the payment of the fee described in the first paragraph
reveal that her mother’s financial situation has deteriorated since she paid the fee described in the first paragraph

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
